content: Grab the green Wisp, and let the ball deal with the Searing-Fire, as you make your way up and to the right, where you'll find a Turtle Treasure guarding a chest. Take down the Turtle Treasure and open the chest to grab Knot of Voidness, medicines, and gold.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass III' and the sub-subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai'.
The content is as follows:
Grab the green Wisp, and let the ball deal with the Searing-Fire, as you make your way up and to the right, where you'll find a Turtle Treasure guarding a chest. Take down the Turtle Treasure and open the chest to grab Knot of Voidness, medicines, and gold.
